Package: org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.gradle

[Groovy] Class SemverExtension

    • org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.gradle.SemverExtension

    • Configuration for the behavior of version inference.

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Scope  defaultScope
          The scope to use if none is provided.
          org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage  defaultStage
          The stage to use if none is provided.
          boolean  enforcePrecedence
          Whether or not version precedence should be enforced when the next version is inferred.
          java.util.SortedSet<org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage>  stages
          The stages to allow.
          java.util.function.Supplier<org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Vcs>  vcsSupplier
          Lambda that will return the Vcs to pass into the Versioner.
          java.util.function.Supplier<org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Versioner>  versionerSupplier
          Lambda that will return the versioner to use when inferring the project's version.

      • Property Detail

        • org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Scope defaultScope

          The scope to use if none is provided. Default is MINOR.

        • org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage defaultStage

          The stage to use if none is provided. Default is null.

        • boolean enforcePrecedence

          Whether or not version precedence should be enforced when the next version is inferred. Default is true.

        • java.util.SortedSet<org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage> stages

          The stages to allow. Default is: final, rc (fixed), milestone (fixed), dev (floating).

        • java.util.function.Supplier<org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Vcs> vcsSupplier

          Lambda that will return the Vcs to pass into the Versioner.

        • java.util.function.Supplier<org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Versioner> versionerSupplier

          Lambda that will return the versioner to use when inferring the project's version.

      • Method Detail

        • org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage finalStage()

          Helper to create a final stage.

          Returns:
          a final stage
          See Also:
          org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage#finalStage()

        • java.util.List<org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage> fixedStages(java.lang.String... names)

          Helper to create one or more fixed stages.

          Returns:
          a list of fixed stages
          Parameters:
          names - the names of the stages
          See Also:
          org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage#fixedStage(String)

        • java.util.List<org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage> floatingStages(java.lang.String... names)

          Helper to create one or more floating stages.

          Returns:
          a list of floating stages
          Parameters:
          names - the names of the stages
          See Also:
          org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage#floatingStage(String)

        • org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage getDefaultStage()

          Gets the stage to use if none is provided. If not explicitly set, the stage with the lowest precedence is used.

          Returns:
          the default stage

        • org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage getStage(java.lang.String name)

          Gets a stage by name.

          Returns:
          the stage (or null if none with that name is configured)
          Parameters:
          name - the name of the stage to return

        • void setStages(java.lang.Iterable<org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage> stages)

          Overrides the currently configured stages with those provided.

          Parameters:
          stages - the stages to use (existing ones are removed)

        • org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage snapshotStage()

          Helper to create a snapshot stage.

          Returns:
          a snapshot stage
          See Also:
          org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage#snapshotStage()

        • SemverExtension stages(org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage... stages)

          Adds stages to those already configured.

          Returns:
          this extension
          Parameters:
          stages - the stages to add

        • SemverExtension stages(java.lang.Iterable<org.ajoberstar.semver.vcs.Stage> stages)

          Adds stages to those already configured.

          Returns:
          this extension
          Parameters:
          stages - the stages to add
